cast.original_title: A Matter of Loaf and Death
cast.overview: Wallace and Gromit open a bakery, accidentally getting tied up with a murder mystery in the process. But when Wallace falls in love, Gromit is left to solve the case by himself.
cast.title: A Matter of Loaf and Death

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Sally Lindsay (born 8 July 1973, Manchester, England) is an English actress best known for playing the role of Shelley Unwin in the long-running ITV1 Soap opera Coronation Street.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Sally Lindsay, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
